FuncDef: The cd command changes the current working path or directory on the remote SFTP server. The cd command changes the current working path or directory on the remote SFTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the target path or directory on the SFTP server.
The value is a string. The absolute path of the directory ranges from 1 to 255 case-insensitive characters without a blank space.

ExtraInfo: You can run the cd command to change the current working directory. The root directory is the default working directory.
